Interface JTABot


  • public interface JTABot
    A bot.

    • Method Detail

      • getToken

        String getToken()
        "Generates" a new token. The token should not be saved in a variable because tokens get invalidated after a minute.
        Returns:
        the new token.

      • getUserAccessTokenLink

        URL getUserAccessTokenLink()
        Returns the user access token link to using the needed permissions set with addNeededPermissions(EnumSet) and removeNeededPermissions(EnumSet).
        Returns:
        the generated link as URL.

      • setUserAccessToken

        void setUserAccessToken(User user,
                        String userToken)
        Adds a user access token. A detailed manual on how to get this can be found here.
        Parameters:
        user - the user.
        userToken - the user access token.

      • addUserAccessTokens

        void addUserAccessTokens(Map<User,String> tokens)
        Adds a list of user access tokens. A detailed manual on how to get this can be found here.
        Parameters:
        tokens - the tokens.

      • getUserAccessToken

        String getUserAccessToken(User user)
        Returns the user access token of a user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to get the access token from.
        Returns:
        the user access token.

      • isTokenValid

        boolean isTokenValid(String token)
        Returns whether the token is valid.
        Parameters:
        token - the token.
        Returns:
        if the token is valid.

      • getTokenPermissions

        EnumSet<Permission> getTokenPermissions(String token)
        Returns a list containing all permissions the token has.
        Parameters:
        token - the token.
        Returns:
        the permissions.

      • getClientId

        String getClientId()
        Returns the client id.
        Returns:
        the client id

      • setRedirectUri

        void setRedirectUri(String redirectUri)
        Sets the redirect uri used when getting the token.
        Parameters:
        redirectUri - the redirect uri.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the bot.

      • getUserByName

        User getUserByName(String name)
        Gets a user by name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to search for.
        Returns:
        the user. null, if no user was found.

                            Listener... more)

        more - more listeners.
        Returns:
        the bot.
